name: Crawler
desc: A ground unit consisting of a stripped-down frame with high explosives strapped on top. Not particular durable. Explodes on contact with enemies.

name: Dagger
desc: The most basic ground mech. Cheap to produce. Overwhelming when used in swarms.

name: Draug
desc: A primitive mining drone. Cheap to produce. Expendable. Automatically mines copper and lead in the vicinity. Delivers mined resources to the closest core.

name: Ghoul
desc: A heavy carpet bomber. Rips through enemy structures, targeting critical infrastructure.
